snippet: Wyatt Gillette, who had a disease affecting his brain, immune system and skin, received the rare title from his father’s colleagues in California on Saturday, then died on Sunday....
lead_paragraph: Wyatt Gillette, who had a disease affecting his brain, immune system and skin, received the rare title from his father’s colleagues in California on Saturday, then died on Sunday.

headline.main: Ill Boy, 7, Dies a Day After Being Made Honorary Marine
